sentence.Network_en: The distant thunder from the coast continued sporadically.

entry.def: Sporadic occurrences of something happen at irregular intervals.

example.ex: ...a year of sporadic fighting over northern France...
example.tran: 法国北部发生零星战斗的一年

example.ex: The sound of sporadic shooting could still be heard.
